ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: out of a sperm-drop when it spurted forth;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: From a drop of semen when emitted;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: from a drop of sperm when it was emitted,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: From a drop of liquid, when it is added?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: From Nutfah when it is emitted.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: From the small seed when it is adapted
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: of a sperm-drop, when it was cast forth,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: From a drop (of seed) when it is poured forth;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: from an ejected drop of sperm;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: From seed when it is emitted.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: from a drop of [seminal] fluid when emitted;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: From a seed when lodged (in its place);
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: From Nutfah (drops of semen male and female discharges) when it is emitted;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: From a sperm drop, when emitted.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: From a sperm-drop when it is emitted
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [53:46] from a drop [of semen] once it is emitted, [once] it is poured forth into the womb,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: From a drop (of seed) when it is poured forth) in the womb of the woman; it is also said that this means: when it is created;
